introduction.heading: I am a Software Engineer and Game Programmer based in New York City.
introduction.description: Currently, I am looking for open, entry level positions that are primarily focused on full-stack development, with a very strong preference in front-end to assist in my desire to pursue a career in game development in the near future. Though I am not a perfectionist, I am very detail-oriented and driven by self-motivivation to complete necessary tasks.

education.heading: B.S. in Computer Science with specialization in Game Programming
